import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import $ from 'jquery'; import TemaComponent from "./TemaComponent"; import {fetchThemes} from "../actions/themesActions"; import {fetchGetEvent} from "../actions/getEventAction"; import Select from 'react-select'; class SiteFesta extends Component { componentDidMount(){ this.props.fetchThemes( null, null, null, null, null, 1); this.props.fetchGetEvent(this.props.match.params.id) } constructor(props){ super(props); this.state({ headerBackgroundImage: null }) } handleChange = (newValue: any, actionMeta: any ) => { console.group(newValue.object.sessions[0].sub_sessions[5].features[0].value); this.setState({ headerBackgroundImage : newValue.object.sessions[0].sub_sessions[5].features[0].value }) } render() { const {items} = this.props.themes; const {EVENTO} = this.props.event.items console.log(items) var categories_options = []; if ( undefined !== items ) { items.map( ( theme ) => { var id = theme.id; var name = theme.name; categories_options.push( { value: id, label : name, object : theme } ); }) } return(

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ themes: state.themes, event: state.eventOrganizer }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {fetchThemes, fetchGetEvent})(SiteFesta);
